title: Subchapter J - VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTERS' AND VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKERS
content:
Subchapter J - VOLUNTEER FIREFIGHTERS' AND VOLUNTEER AMBULANCE WORKERS
State Regulations

Part 400 - Application Of Workers' Compensation Board Rules To The Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law (§ 400.1 to 400.6)

Part 401 - Application Of Chair Rules To The Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law (§ 401.1 to 401.7)

Part 402 - Application Of Medical Appeals Unit Rules To The Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law (§ 402.1)

Part 403 - CONTROVERTED CLAIMS FOR BENEFITS FOR DEATH OR DISABILITY DUE TO DISEASE OR MALFUNCTION OF THE HEART OR OF ONE OR MORE CORONARY ARTERIES (§ 403.1)

Part 410 - Application Of Workers' Compensation Board Rules To The Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law (§ 410.1)

Part 411 - Application Of Chair Rules To The Voluntary Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law (§ 411.1 to 411.7)

Part 412 - Application Of Medical Appeals Unit Rules To The Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law (§ 412.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
